messages.message: I noticed what seems like a bug while I was copying some folders from ted's workspace into mine. When I copy one of his folders to anywhere in my workspace, I get a nested folder - so copying `my folder 1/my file.txt` would get me `my folder 1/my folder 1/my file.txt`. I've attached the HAR for one of the copy requests just in case I'm sending something incorrectly. When I try it within my own workspace I don't get the same behavior.
i’ve gotten that a ton as well but never quite figured out how to reproduce consistently.
albeit tbh i haven’t tried very hard to reproduce.
I can reliably reproduce it by copying folders from ted's repos into mine, which makes me think that maybe it's from copying folders between repos?
i’ve almost certainly gotten it copying folders within repos, but yea only sometimes.
just an FYI for the ticket, you can reproduce it consistently already so i don’t think we need to trace that now.
